title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Meet the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Stick in Putty Matte — simple, gentle, and long‑lasting.

Why you’ll like it
- Easy to use: It’s a crayon-style stick. No brushes needed. Just swipe on your eyelid.
- Soft, natural color: Putty Matte is a light taupe-pink that brightens eyes without looking heavy.
- Feels creamy, finishes smooth: Glides on like cream, then sets like powder so it won’t smear.
- Stays put: Waterproof and crease-proof. Lasts all day without fading.
- Kind to delicate skin: Enriched with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and candelilla wax to nourish and protect.
- Many choices: Available in matte, shimmer, and metallic finishes, with dozens of shades if you want to try more.

How to use (quick and simple)
1) Twist up the stick.
2) Swipe color directly on your eyelid.
3) Blend gently with the built-in smudger on the other end, or use your fingertip.
4) Blend right away before it sets (it sets quickly so it stays put).
Tip: For more color, add a second light swipe and blend again.

Good to know
- No extra tools required.
- Smooth on sensitive or mature skin.
- Helps improve the look and feel of the skin over time with antioxidants.

If you want an easy eye look that lasts and feels comfortable, the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Stick in Putty Matte is a friendly, fuss-free choice.
